product_name: Swiss Army Spartan REI Cities Pocket Knife
long_description: This Swiss Army Spartan REI Cities pocket knife sports REI-exclusive handle scales that hold 2 blades and other tools-perfect for slipping into your pocket or attaching to your keychain. Includes large and small blades, can opener/small screwdriver, bottle opener/large screwdriver, wire stripper, tweezers, reamer, corkscrew, toothpick and lanyard ring. The Swiss Army Spartan REI Cities pocket knife features rugged Swiss stainless-steel components and aluminum interior housings which help ensure this knife will last for years.
short_description: This Swiss Army Spartan REI Cities pocket knife sports REI-exclusive handle scales that hold 2 blades and other tools-perfect for slipping into your pocket or attaching to your keychain.
